page.title: 02 Occult
page.content: Some people say that they have seen ghosts in Whitstable,at the Ten O'Clock shop which is a general store in Canterbury Road.They say that the ghost was a very young girl of about twelve years old.She is said to have been a witch so the people of the town burnt her.She seems to be in a fire, screaming.In Saint Alphege School there is said to be a ghost who rises from a stone block and then puts on a grey cloak.She walks around and then disappears.There is a ghost in a housing estate called Doggerel Acre which is of a young maid who has moved from a road not far away, no one knows who she is but she is said to have been seen quite a few times this year. Several people have reported seeing a horse and carriage in Joy Lane, driven by men in Georgian costume.
